title: Cthulhuducken
author: JGray
text:
Theresa was feeling a little blue about missing the holidays back home so Chrys decided to cheer her up!

I don't think Chrys quite gets Thanksgiving.

Speaking of which!

When I mentioned, last week, that we would have one story update this week I completely spaced on the fact that this is the Thanksgiving holiday week. Which means, instead, you all get this lovely filler Keith made.

Story comics resume next week!

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: I hate to be picky, but - what the HECK is with Theresa's eyes?

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text:
I believe that may be here: mysteriesofthearcana.com/comics/243/

She has a similar look.
** note that if you peruse the archives, like with that link, the site saves your progress.  It's meant to make archive binging easier. Just click the latest link for the newest comic.
Last edited by Guest
